isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Striker Pin on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 47 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Front cab door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with the door latch assembly (Item 7, Figure 73) . Front cab door striker pin removal and installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting holes in cab lock pillar and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: Position the front cab door striker pin (Item 1) at the cab lock pillar (Item 2) and install two torx head bolts (Item 4) through front cab door striker pin, cab lock pillar into floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5), located inside cab lock pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and tighten to 19 to 23.5 Lbf-ft (26 to 32 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door striker pin.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Striker Pin on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Crew cab rear door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with the door latch assembly (Item 7, Figure 75) . Crew cab rear door striker pin removal and installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting holes in cab lock pillar and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: Position the crew cab rear door striker pin (Item 1) at the cab lock pillar (Item 2) and install two torx head bolts (Item 4) through crew cab rear door striker pin, cab lock pillar into floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5), located inside cab lock pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and tighten to 19 to 23.5 Lbf-ft (26 to 32 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side crew cab rear door striker pin.
